name: Mudsdale
description: The Draft Horse Pokémon. It remains calm and unmoving no matter the situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its mouth to make a special kind of mud.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is damaged by a move, increase its AC by 2 until the start of its next turn. This ability does not stack and will remain in effect if the Pokémon is successfully attacked multiple turns in a row.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.
